short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A shortcut to download the audio file from the Overcast webplayer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go to the Overcast webplayer for any podcast and click this extension's button. The currently playing podcast will download.  It's that simple. No more navigating through the document html to find the audio source element and its src attribute copying that value and pasting it into the url bar hitting enter and then saving that page as an mp3.
